parameters: Hello, \N[1]. Do you require my assistance?
Or perhaps I can answer any questions you may have?
Where should I go next?
Who are you?
Who am I?
Where am I?
I'm done with my mission.
I'm good, thanks.
Where should I go next?
\N[1]! Make your way to the castle of Halcyon!
That is where the wicked force that you must destroy
resides.
Who are you?
Me? \|I am merely your helpful guide, \N[1].
Whenever you are confused about what to do or where to go,
you can come and see me.
Who am I?
\N[1]! You are the Legendary Hero, here to
save this world from doom! You are the chosen one!
Where am I?
This is the Cave of Exegesis, located on the peak of
the Mountain of Incipiency. It is a special link between
realms that only you, the Legendary Hero, can enter.
I'm done with my mission.
You are? ...\|It seems to me that you are not yet done. Go
forth and be victorious, then return to this place.
I said I'm done
Okay
I said I'm done
Oh\..\..\..are you very sure that you're done?
Yes
No
Yes
Yes
No
Yes
\..\..\..very well.\. Farewell, Legendary Hero.
Hopefully this world will be able to get by
without a Legendary Hero to help...
No
No
Okay
I'm good, thanks.
Any further questions that I can answer?
I shall be here if you require further assistance. Now then,
\N[1], go forth and fulfill your awesome quest!
Hello, \N[1].\! My, that was fast!
Have you saved the world already?
Sword of Divine Might?
\..\..\..you\..\..\..broke it?\| How is that even possible?\|
It would have had to have been an incredibly powerful dark
power to shatter a blade of that caliber\..\..\..
That was a one of a kind instrument of evil's bane, and you
break it as soon as I hand it over to you.\! Inconceivable...
\..\..\..Nevertheless, you must continue with your
mission, \N[1].
All is not lost. I can sense the fragments of your sword
scattered across the land. Before you go to the castle of
Halcyon, you must find them all and repair the Sword of
Divine Might.
If you ever have trouble wondering where to search for your
sword fragments next, you need only ask me.
Now then. What can I help with?
Where should I go next?
Who are you?
Who am I?
Where am I?
I'm done with my mission.
I'm good, thanks.
Where should I go next?
\N[1]! You look rather tired.
Even Legendary Heroes need to rest and recuperate. Why
don't you spend the night at the Campsite on the base of
the mountain. Relax and recharge there until the morning.
\N[1]!\| I see you've found one of your sword
fragments. \.Good show!
Perhaps you should inquire about the others in one of the
nearby villages? Perhaps they could lead you to a few of
the remaining pieces.
I see you've found two pieces \N[1].\. Well done.
But...how are you reading this? You should have gotten the
third piece directly after receiving the second piece...\!
Are you cheating, \N[1]?
I see you've found three pieces \N[1].\. Excellent work.
Hm\..\..\..it's troubling though.\. The next piece nearest to
you is far off in the ocean.\. How do you suppose to reach
it?
Surely it's nothing a Legendary Hero can't figure out!
That's four sword pieces, \N[1]!\.
Halfway there!
I can sense another piece through a place that's very dark.\.
But it seems that someone has gotten ahold of it before
you!\.
Hm\..\..\..is this mysterious someone a friend or foe?
Only one way to find out,\. \N[1]!
Five pieces now? Very good show, \N[1].
I see you've been making friends!\. That's good to see.\.
An \..\..\..interesting bunch of characters they are.\.
With their help,\. I'm sure collecting the rest of your
sword pieces will be no problem at all.
I can sense two sword pieces near Halcyon,\. each one in a
different neighboring settlement.\. Which area will you
explore first, \N[1]?
Six pieces now? Nearly there, \N[1].
Now you should attempt to locate the next sword
fragment from the area opposite from the fragment
you most recently found.
Seven pieces! One more to go,\. and your sword will finally
be restored, \N[1].
I sense the final piece in a location north of Halcyon.\.
You will have to pass through Halcyon in order to find
it.
Remember, \N[1].\. The wicked force you must defeat
resides in the castle of Halcyon.\. Once you restore
your sword,\. head there.
Who are you?
Me? \|I am merely your helpful guide, \N[1].
Whenever you are confused about what to do or where to go,
you can come and see me.
Who am I?
\N[1]! You are the Legendary Hero, here to

enter.
I'm done with my mission.

B
Welcome back, \N[1].
You have finally completed your quest.\. You've made many
friends and been to many places.\. And now this world is
saved thanks to you.\. The residents therein can enjoy the
peace you've won, without the fear of certain destruction.
For now...
But let's not think about that right now.\. For the moment,
the world is saved.\. I hope you feel quite accomplished.
But you cannot rest, Legendary Hero.\. There are many more
worlds out there that could use a hero like you, especially
the world you call your own.
There is still so much more that you need to do.
EndScreen
A
B
\N[1]. A wicked force is gaining momentum which, \.
if left uncontended, \.could mean the end of the world.
It is your mission to quash this growing threat before
its power surges out of control.
The wicked force resides in the castle of Halcyon. \.Go there
and vanquish it before it’s too late. \.You must not fail.
Once you are finished with your mission, return to this
place.
Do you understand?
Shows character portrait of who you chose
Yes
No
Yes
No
I will explain your quest to you as many times as you wish
then. \.Listen carefully.
GlowingSword
Take this!\. The Sword of Divine Might! \.With this great
weapon, the wicked force will be left vulnerable.
The minds of you and those around you will be fortified and
unable to be broken as long as you have this sword by your
side.
Cherish it, and let nothing happen to it.
You equipped the Sword of Divine Might!
I also bestow upon you the Legendary Armor! The Shield of
Impregnable Fortification, the Hero's Helm, the Breastplate
of Righteousness, and the Boots of Swift Justice!
You equipped the Shield of Impregnable Fortification!
You equipped the Hero's Helm!
You equipped the Breastplate of Righteousness!
You equipped the Boots of Swift Justice!
With the Sword of Divine Might and the legendary armor,\.
you are a force to be reckoned with.\. You'll find that
the strength of most of the monsters on this mountain
don't even compare to yours.
Use your newfound power responsibly, as a Legendary Hero
would.
If at any time during your quest you require more guidance,
I shall be here and here I shall be. \.Simply stand on the
glowing platform to speak with me.
Now, \N[1], make haste!\. To the castle! \.
The fate of this world lies in your hands.
